Issue.description: channel_tendermint_genesis = 1; }{code} Right now we implement it with one channel per tendermint core model. So we have 'ChannelTendermintGenesis' config, each channel has a 'TendermintGenesis' config. 'TendermintGenesis' has most basic config for running tendermint core, genesis_time and validators. 'TendermintValidator' also has most basic for tendermint validator, the 'pub_key' config need more explains. Since currently tendermint not support scep256r1, we cannot use orderer's msp for tendermint validator identity. We need generate another ed25516 key pair for running tendermint validator right now, we will submit a patch to tendermint soon in order to support scep256r1 and we can remove this config and just use orderer msp. >
